summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 18
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with one gaining and the other 18 declining.
Bitcoin fell 2.6% to $20,781 by market close.
